messages.subject: Paging John Kurata / Ricecracker
messages.msgSnippet: I have contacted you by email and by telephone regarding a sword that I would like to be identified and appraised. I haven t received a reply from you. Please
messages.messageBody: I have contacted you by email and by telephone regarding a sword that I would like to be identified and appraised. I haven't received a reply from you. Please let me know if you are/are not interested. I'll be glad to leave you alone and look somewhere else.
